page.title: 04Childrens Leisure-Shepshed
page.content: {School}is from{9 a.m.to 3 p.m.}so children have plenty of time to pursue leisure activities. Much of their leisure time is spent in{informal individual and group activites, although most children over 7 years old in{Shepshed}belong to at least one club. Girls enjoy{Brownies}and{Girls {Brigade,}and there are similar clubs for boys. Some children attend{Youth {Clubs.}At all of these clubs there are opportunities to learn different skills and to mix with various age groups. Firm favourites with many boys are{scrambler and B.M.X. bikes,}and races are organised between clubs. Some of the children belong to{sports {clubs,}including{gymnastics, karate, {judo}and{swimming.}A number of children are learning to play{musical {instruments,}and some play in a{band.
